p.hi:
OFFICE OF THE
American Diamond Drill Co.Compagnia / Compagnie / Company (Gesellschaft),
Manufacturers of LESCHOT'S PATENT
DIAMOND-POINTED STEAM DRILLS,
For Mining, Quarrying, Shafting, Tunneling, Prospecting, Draining, Grading, and Submarine Blasting.
SPECIAL ATTENTION GIVEN TO DEEP BORING FOR TESTING THE VALUE OF MINES AND QUARRIES.
61 LIBERTY STREET,

div.p: DrDoktor / Doctor A. Escher PrestPresident (Präsident) etc.et cetera (und anderes) wohl das sog. tironische Et und c. als Zeichen für etc. Lucerne

body.p:
Can the time for the
opening of the bids for contracts offered to your
company, be extended for twenty or thirty days?
I am authorized to enter into competition with
others, but am waiting for one or two items of in
formation that will enable me to place our
Company among the bidders for the work. I trust
that the 18th of May, may not be arbitrarily fixed
as we are very anxious that an American Asso
ciation may help in the Grand fulfillment of
Your Company's design. Our Machinery is now
so perfect, that we feel confident that we can
work with greater dispatch and economy, than
can be secured by any other system or organiza
tion. Please favor me with an early reply.

I send you pamphlet of
our Drills.

div.p: Care Munroe & CoCompagnia / Compagnie / Company (Gesellschaft), Paris, France
